MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in Blair Farm and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm this is to restore the local network to normal following repairs on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:54pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
